is_silence[source]

is_silence(audio, thresh=-70)

checks if entire clip is 'silence' below some dB threshold

Type Default Details
audio torch tensor of multichannel audio
thresh int -70 threshold in dB below which we declare to be silence
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import torch 

x = torch.ones((2,10))
assert not is_silence(1e-3*x) # not silent
assert is_silence(1e-5*x) # silent
assert is_silence(1e-3*x, thresh=-50) # higher thresh
{% endraw %}

class HostPrinter[source]

HostPrinter(accelerator)

lil accelerate utility for only printint on host node

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
accelerator = accelerate.Accelerator()
device = accelerator.device
hprint = HostPrinter(accelerator)
hprint(f'Using device: {device}')

Using device: cuda
